languages.text: "Слушаюсь!" {n}Женщина вытягивается по струнке.{/n} "Капитан Ракель Вихари, подданная династии Винтерскейл, пилот этого шаттла! Имею честь приветствовать {mf|Его|Ее} высокоблагородие {mf|господина|госпожу} фон Валанциус!"

"At once!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "Слушаюсь!" {n}Женщина вытягивается по струнке.{/n} "Капитан Ракель Вихари, подданная династии Винтерскейл, пилот этого шаттла! Имею честь приветствовать {mf|Его|Ее} высокоблагородие {mf|господина|госпожу} фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "At once, sir!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

"At once, sir!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

"At once, sir!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

"At once, sir!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

"At once, sir!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

"At once, sir!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

languages.text: «¡A sus órdenes!». {n}La mujer se coloca en posición firme.{/n} «¡Capitana Raquel Vekhari, sirviente de la casa Winterscale y piloto de esta lanzadera! ¡Es un honor recibir a {mf|milord|milady} von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "At once!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: «¡A sus órdenes, señor!». {n}La mujer se coloca en posición firme.{/n} «¡Capitana Raquel Vekhari, sirviente de la casa Winterscale y piloto de esta lanzadera! ¡Es un honor recibir a {mf|milord|milady} von Valancius!».

languages.text: "Augenblicklich!" {n}Die Frau richtet sich auf.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, Dienerin von Haus Winterzunder und Pilotin dieses Shuttles! Es ist eine Ehre, {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} von Valancius zu grüßen!"
languages.original_text: "At once!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Augenblicklich, Sir! {n}Die Frau richtet sich auf.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, Dienerin von Haus Winterzunder und Pilotin dieses Shuttles! Es ist eine Ehre, {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} von Valancius zu grüßen!"

languages.text: « Tout de suite ! » {n}La femme se met au garde-à-vous.{/n} « Capitaine Raquel Vekhari, servante de la maison Winterscale et pilote de cette navette ! C'est un honneur de saluer Sa Seigneurie von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "At once!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: « Tout de suite, monsieur ! » {n}La femme se met au garde-à-vous.{/n} « Capitaine Raquel Vekhari, servante de la maison Winterscale et pilote de cette navette ! C'est un honneur de saluer Sa Seigneurie von Valancius ! »

languages.text: “遵命！”{n}女子立正站好。{/n}“我是菈克尔·维克哈里上尉，温特斯凯尔家族的臣民，也是这艘穿梭机的飞行员！很荣幸见到您，冯·瓦兰修斯大人！”
languages.original_text: "At once!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: “遵命，长官！”{n}女子立正站好。{/n}“我是菈克尔·维克哈里上尉，温特斯凯尔家族的臣民，也是这艘穿梭机的飞行员！很荣幸见到您，冯·瓦兰修斯大人！”

languages.text: 「はっ、直ちに！」{n}女性はピシッと背筋を伸ばす。{/n}「ウィンタースケール家の従者であり、このシャトルの操縦士でもあるラケル・ヴェカール中隊長であります！フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下にご挨拶できるとは光栄です！」
languages.original_text: "At once!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: 「はい、直ちに！」{n}女性はピシッと背筋を伸ばす。{/n}「ウィンタースケール家の従者、このシャトルの操縦士でもあるラケル・ヴェカール中隊長であります！{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウスにご挨拶できるとは光栄です！」
「はっ、直ちに！」{n}女性はピシッと背筋を伸ばす。{/n}「ウィンタースケール家の従者であり、このシャトルの操縦士でもあるラケル・ヴェカール中隊長であります！フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下にご挨拶できるとは光栄です！」

languages.text: "Emredersiniz!" {n}Kadın, hazır ola geçiyor.{/n} "Kaptan Raquel Vekhari, Winterscale Hanesi hizmetkârı ve bu mekiğin pilotuyum! {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius Hazretleri'ni karşılamak bir şereftir!"
languages.original_text: "At once!" {n}The woman stands at attention.{/n} "Captain Raquel Vekhari, servant of House Winterscale and the pilot of this shuttle! It is an honour to be greeting {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Emredersiniz efendim!" {n}Kadın, hazır ola geçiyor.{/n} "Kaptan Raquel Vekhari, Winterscale Hanesi hizmetkârı ve bu mekiğin pilotuyum! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri von Valancius'u karşılamak bir şereftir!"
